data.oai_dc:dc: This archive contains Python code for simulating populations using the package simuPOP, plus additional data files, used in Pritchard et al. (2016):*.py: code for simulating test or reference individuals.Estimated_allele_frequencies.csv: estimated frequencies of the 200 discriminatory alleles, from Table S3.Allele_frequencies_for_simulations.csv: adjusted allele frequencies used for simulations, from Table S3.See README file in archive for further information.
